QuestionStem: A cell is the simplest level of organization in an organism. Just like the organism as a whole, a cell is a system. Explore the image of the plant cell for more information about the cell as a system.

panels.title: cell wall
panels.description: The cell wall gives the plant cell structure and support.

panels.title: cell membrane
panels.description: The cell membrane surrounds and protects the cell. Nutrients enter the cell through the cell wall and cell membrane. Waste products leave the cell through the cell membrane and cell wall.

panels.title: chloroplasts
panels.description: Chloroplasts are the organelles that produce energy for the cell through photosynthesis.
